```{r}
output$dataTeam <- renderDT({
    xl <- "<img src=\"%s\" style=\"height: 15%s;\"</img>"
    x <- main$team %>%
        mutate(Logo = xl) %>%
        select(
            Logo,
            Team,
            Name,
            Conference,
            Division
        )
    xlt <- unlist(main$logo[tolower(x$Team)])
    x$Logo <- sprintf(x$Logo, xlt, "%")
    datatable(
        data = x,
        escape = FALSE,
        selection = "none",
        extensions = "Scroller",
        options = list(
            dom = "t",
            pageLength = nrow(x),
            ordering = FALSE,
            scrollY = 800,
            scrollCollapse = FALSE,
            columnDefs = list(
                list(
                    targets = c(0:4),
                    className = "dt-center"
                )
            )
        ),
        rownames = FALSE,
        colnames = c(
            "Logo",
            "Team",
            "Name",
            "Conference",
            "Division"
        )
    )
})
DTOutput("dataTeam")
```
